antiPatterns.name: Wrong Cuts
antiPatterns.description: Services are split on the basis of technical layers (presentation, business, and data layers) instead of business capabilities.
antiPatterns.consequences: Such a wrong separation of concerns can lead to increased data-splitting complexity. Moreover, this may cause ripple effects on changes and therefore decreases maintainability. Lastly, it may impact performance, if several services are needed to fulfill an abstraction.
antiPatterns.solution: Perform a clear analysis of business processes and the need for resources and use this knowledge to refactor the services according to bounded contexts.
